U

ui - package ui
This package contains UI related classes and logic to bootstrap the application.
update(Observable, Object) - Method in class controller.CardExchangeViewController
This methods updated the ui when called by the Subject
update(Observable, Object) - Method in class controller.PhaseViewController
Overridden method of Observer.update(Observable, Object) to update view according to updated to state of Observable object passed as parameter.
update(Observable, Object) - Method in class controller.WorldDominationViewController
Overridden method from Observer.update(Observable, Object) to update the UI once observer is notified of observer state change.
updateContiControlValue(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.MapController
This method handle MapController.updateContiControlValueButton button event to update selected continent army value in Continent object in MapController#continentTerritoriesMapping mapping.
updateContiControlValueButton - Variable in class controller.MapController
This variable is the id of the button that updates the control value of the continent.
updateDefenderTerritories(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.GameController
This method handles GameController.attackAttackerCB comboBox value change event to update GameController.attackDefenderCB comboBox values.
updateFortifiableTerritories(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.GameController
This method handles GameController.fortifyFromTerritoryCB comboBox value change event to update GameController.fortifyToTerritoryCB comboBox values.
updateMapData() - Method in class controller.GameController
This method update the army values in each territory for whole map.
updatePhaseInfo(String, String, String) - Method in class controller.GameController
A centralized method which is called from all over the code to update the phase information model state.
updateState(HashSet<Continent>, HashSet<Territory>) - Method in class domain.WorldDominationModel
This method is called by controller to update this model state which is further reflected by view.
updateTerritoriesPerContinent(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.MapController
This method handle MapController.contsCB ComboBox value change event to update related territories on UI.
updateTerritoriesPerTerritory(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.MapController
This method handle MapController.terrsCB ComboBox value change event to update related territories on UI.
updateTerritoryFields(Territory) - Method in class controller.GameController
This method update the army values for selected territory.
